mapper.select: SELECT ct.id AS cityid, ct.name_cn AS namecn, ct.name_en AS nameen, ct.create_time AS createtime FROM city ct ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT ct.id AS cityid, ct.name_cn AS namecn, ct.name_en AS nameen, ct.create_time AS createtime FROM city ct WHERE ct.id =#{cityid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO city ( name_cn, name_en, create_time) VALUES (#{map.namecn}, #{map.nameen}, #{map.createtime})
